item.description: Winning Genes: How to Create, Grow, and Sustain a Successful Life Sciences Company When:              Tuesday, May 10, 2011 from 8:45 a.m. to 3:30 p.m. Where:             Genzyme Headquarters, 500 Kendall Street, Cambridge, MA Register:http://reactionweb.foley2.com/reaction/RSGenPage.asp?RSID=PMXh6AR1LpGRjCI9os0AuE_NPVgZPXpIzVcCzBbPCVQ&RS_REFERRSID=MDKg11V7rCiSvHXJYKgz-sTqDrIeqn4ur5Mpdw_lbC8&RS_ORIGRSID=MDKg11V7rCiSvHXJYKgz-sTqDrIeqn4ur5Mpdw_lbC8 Today’s biotech market is experiencing a slow but steady rebound. This type of change demands new approaches to long- and short-term financial strategies, fresh perspective on licensing and collaborations, and risk management strategies to sustain both early and established biopharma companies. This half-day conference is complimentary; however, registration is required. Foley & Lardner LLP will apply for CLE credit after the program, wherever applicable.
item.name: How to Create, Grow, and Sustain a Successful Life Sciences Company
